name: vFETablaPago
description: Vista normalizada de pagos del e-CF
ddl:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vFETablaPago
AS
SELECT NumeroFacturaInterna, SUBSTRING(eNCF,1,1) AS TipoECFL, RNCEmisor, TipoECF, eNCF,
       FormaPago1 AS FormaPago, MontoPago1 AS MontoPago
FROM FEEncabezado WHERE FormaPago1 IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT NumeroFacturaInterna, SUBSTRING(eNCF,1,1), RNCEmisor, TipoECF, eNCF,
       FormaPago2, MontoPago2
FROM FEEncabezado WHERE FormaPago2 IS NOT NULL
